articles.description: In Q2 FY24, the firm reported a 3.4% rise in profit at Rs 394.3 crore against Rs 381.2 crore in the year-ago period. The revenue in Q2 FY24, however, climbed only marginally to Rs 4,914.3 crore, as compared to Rs 4,908.9 crore in the preceding year.
articles.content: Shares of Rail Vikas Nigam (RVNL) rose over 3% to Rs 186 in Wednesday's trade on BSE after KRDCL - RVNL JV received a letter of award (LoA) for Rs 123 crore order to redevelop Varkala Sivagiri railwa… [+2042 chars]
